name: Samurai Loop
description:
Commands:

AWSD - Move

O - Attack

P - Create Time Loop

Hit the monster in the eye to kill it!

A small game I created for MiniGameJam 113.

You are a Samurai who has a peculiar ability to create time loops which allows you to go back to a position you were in the past, marked by the time loop mark. Fight the final boss to win the game.

I didn't have a lot of time to finish, so there is no sound effects, which creates a lack of juicyness in the game. I'll be probably adding as an update to the game.
